attributes.action: register a pregnancy with a certificate of conception
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i have spoken to many people who have suffered a miscarriage. and all do agree that if there was something to hold on two it would make the grieving process easier, and as a baby isnt viable untill 24 weeks a certificate of conception would be ideal that way if you have a miscarriage you have some thing to cherish.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to register a pregnancy with a certificate of conception.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=miscarraige


Her Majesty's Government
